creator: 275862485@qq.com
text:
The unrewrite page have no problem,but the all rewrite page respond a blank page with the "400 Bad Request".

And the rewrite page have no problem when it is visite by the ServerName domain.

vhost config block:
<VirtualHost *:80>
    DocumentRoot /var/www/test/ROOT
    ServerName www.test.com
    ServerAlias xprewww.test.com

    <Directory /var/www/test/ROOT>
        Order allow,deny
        Allow from all
        AllowOverride None
        Options   FollowSymLinks
    </Directory>
RewriteEngine on

RewriteRule ^/partner$                                          /friendLink.action [PT,L]

RewriteRule ^/partner$                                         /friendLink.action [PT,L]

</VirtualHost>
